thread.title: NYC visit - March 2017
thread.title_full: NYC visit - March 2017 - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Wjcoz
title: NYC visit - March 2017
text:
Great location, near the major department stores, near Rockefeller Center, St. Patrick's and other cathedrals, as well as Central Park, theaters, and plenty of great restaurants from the traditional NY Deli to fine dining.
The Hilton is large, but doesn't itself have a restaurant, other than where they serve daily breakfast which is fantastic. It does have a couple of lounges and bars and they were fun, but the menu selection was very limited.
The room was small, but well maintained and appointed, although there was no fridge. Housekeeping staff were very nice, and we had two issues with our room which were corrected immediately.
It's easy to get a cab from the hotel, and subway lines run north south as well.
Hope this is helpful!
